# Pull Request Title

## Summary  
Provide a clear summary of what this PR does and why it is needed.

## Type of Change  
Tick all that apply:

- [ ] **feat** – New feature  
- [ ] **fix** – Bug fix  
- [ ] **docs** – Documentation changes  
- [ ] **refactor** – Code restructuring  
- [ ] **test** – Adding or modifying tests  
- [ ] **perf** – Performance improvement  
- [ ] **build/chore** – CI, dependencies, tooling  
- [ ] **hw** – Hardware-related changes  
- [ ] **BREAKING CHANGE** – Affects the public API or behaviour

Explain the changes in detail, including motivations and design decisions.

## Checklists

### Code Quality  
- [ ] My commits follow the ROOTS Commit Message Guidelines  
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation (README, docs/, etc.)  
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG (if applicable)  
- [ ] My code follows the project’s style and conventions  
- [ ] I have removed unused code and debugging statements  

### Hardware (if applicable)  
- [ ] Schematics updated  
- [ ] PCB files updated  
- [ ] BOM updated  
- [ ] Tested on physical hardware  
- [ ] Design files validated (DRC/ERC clean)  

### Project Impact  
- [ ] No breaking changes  
- [ ] Breaking changes documented clearly  
- [ ] Version bump suggested (PATCH / MINOR / MAJOR)

Add any extra context the reviewers should be aware of.
